title: Purpose of Outer Join
text: The outer join returns all rows from both tables, even those rows on one side that do not have a match on the other side.

title: Purpose of Right Join
text: A right join returns all rows in the right table, even if they do not have a match on the left table.

title: Purpose of Left Join
text: A left join returns all rows in the left table, even if they do not have a match on the right table.

title: Purpose of Inner Join
text: An inner join only returns matches for items in the left table that are also found in the right table.
